summary: Five brothers reunite for a wedding at the family estate on the day that Spain plays in the 2010 World Cup final.
cast: Antonio de la Torre|Roberto Álamo|Quim Gutiérrez|Miquel Fernández|Patrick Criado|Héctor Colomé|Verónica Echegui|Arancha Martí|Sandra Martín|Sandy Gilberte|Teo Planell|Carmen Arévalo|Pilar Castro|Teresa Lozano|Raúl Arévalo|Alicia Rubio|Lucía Fuertes|Celine Peña|Rodrigo Poisón|Antonio Leyva|David Blanco Toyos|José Félix Romero|Paula Sánchez Arévalo|Olivia Siegal Sánchez
keywords: brother brother relationship|pregnant|spain|watching soccer on tv|little dog
title: La gran familia española
